abstract: The motion picture academy is joining with a Los Angeles county art museum to develop a museum that will showcase the movie industry, though under scaled-back plans and in an existing building rather than a grandiose new one.
snippet: The motion picture academy is joining with a Los Angeles county art museum to develop a museum that will showcase the movie industry, though under scaled-back plans and in an existing building rather than a grandiose new one.

headline.main: Plans Announced for Movie Museum in Los Angeles
